name: Silver Cyber Fox
description:
You play as Sylvie, a hacker Fennec Fox on a mission to rescue the commander by adventuring through a secret facility.

Hack by using your Hacker Boy device to open doors, access computers to blow servers or turn off alarms.

The Hacker Boy has 2 mini games:

  • Input the key sequence
  • Simple math equation solver

There are 4 total levels. The last one can feel a bit unfair, still fun though :)

Project for Lowrezjam 2019

(if by mystical chance I get a donation I'm donating to worldwildlife.org)
